comments.author: najiang@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
The current telemetry implementation for CFR experiments follows by the convention - a CFR experiment is defined by adding a `cohort` property into the pref json string `browser.newtabpage.activity-stream.asrouter.providers.cfr`.

This convention is now invalidated by the new experiment setup with x-man. We should update the CFR telemetry implementation to reflect those changes.
